attributes.action: Make rob eggleton a bit richer for his health
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please can you sign this and donate as much or as little as possible to robeggleton@btinternet.com 
via paypal.com.
He needs the money so he and his girlfriend can move out and buy a house together.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
